EmailTemplate.subject: Order on Hold: Copyright Application Pseudonym Inconsistency
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
There appears to be a problem with your order. Your application will not be filed with the U.S. Copyright Office until this problem is resolved, so please respond to this email as soon as possible.
Specifically, in the questionnaire, you listed [Pseudonym] as the author’s pseudonym (fictitious name). However, you did not indicate that the author’s contribution to the work was pseudonymous.
To resolve this problem, please reply directly to this email and confirm whether or not the work was created under the pseudonym that you listed in the questionnaire. If the work was NOT created under the pseudonym listed, please let us know if your application should be revised to remove the pseudonym and identify a different name for the author. To read more about pseudonymous works, click here.
If you have any questions or would like additional information, you can reply to this email or call us at (800) 773-0888 Monday–Friday from 6 a.m.–7 p.m. PT.
We appreciate your prompt attention to this matter.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
